name: Willard John Thomas
tag_list: venture-capital, ma, mergers, acquisition, funding, equity, debt, spac, start-up, angel
overview:
On a special project basis, WJT will help facilitate access to equity and debt funding for start-up and mid-size companies.

Their referral network includes strategic and financial investors skilled in executing Private Equity, Mergers & Acquisitions, Special Purpose Acquisition Company, Angel, and Venture Capital transactions. Investors are in the U.S., India and China.
